backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing core land minting logic, data types, access control, and registries for land, users, and loot.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for fully reinstalling Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet, including prerequisites and canister IDs.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: High-level checklist for preparing environment variables and configuration before deploying CyberGenesis.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Mainnet deployment guide describing prerequisites and the sequence for deploying all canisters and assets.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Brief deployment steps focusing on correct environment configuration and canister deployment order.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing the DApp architecture, canister roles, and overall system design.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: List of required environment variables for frontend .env configuration.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Guide for setting environment variables and deploying backend canisters to fix configuration errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping specific frontend lighting and material behaviors to source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files and components.
frontend/.env: Production IC mainnet environment configuration containing required canister IDs and stability settings.
frontend/.env.example: Template environment config showing required variables for canister IDs, network settings, and debug options.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the Vite React app and disabling caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity, actor initialization, profile setup, and reinitialization states with animated loading screens.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset backend canister, including asset management, user profiles, and admin functions.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL for the asset backend canister defining asset operations, access control, and user profile APIs.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL for the main backend canister covering lands, rewards, modifiers, user roles, and system queries.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin interface for uploading GLB models with authorization checks, health checks, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Expandable admin panel enabling GLB uploads and periodic asset canister health checks.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostic tool running multiple tests on the asset canister including connectivity, permissions, queries, and cycle balance.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: Admin-only tool to run prechecks, reinitialize the asset canister, and validate its post‑state using status steps and actor calls.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs periodic health checks on land and asset canisters across IC gateways and generates status reports with recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Compares environment-defined canister IDs with expected values and displays correctness indicators for each.
Validates required environment variables and shows a fixed error banner listing missing or incorrect configuration entries.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D cosmic background with stars and nebula effects using a canvas.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Loads and displays biome-specific 3D models using three.js with lighting, environment, and orbit controls.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file kept after moving 3D logic to LandModel.tsx.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: Checks the health of Land and Asset canisters by invoking actor methods and displays real‑time status with refresh and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Handles loading, discovering, and processing loot caches based on land charge and token balance, with UI state and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches render errors and displays a styled fallback or custom fallback component.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Provides staking, proposal creation, and voting UI logic using governance-related query hooks with validation and toast messaging.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land data, cooldown timers, rewards claiming, upgrading, and modifier interactions along with optional admin debugging tools.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and displays a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applies biome-based material tweaks, and auto-fits the camera to the model.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: UI component for selecting and navigating between lands, displaying name, biome and index with previous/next controls.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Fetches and displays top land rankings with loading/error states and styled leaderboard entries.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive canvas-based map viewer with panning, zooming, gestures and biome-based land highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace UI for filtering, buying, listing and canceling listings for lands and modifiers.
Empty component placeholder with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Periodically checks canister connectivity and latency, displaying connection status and metrics.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Animated 2D particle background using canvas with glowing particles and connecting lines.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: Provides UI to edit a land plot’s name and decoration URL using query mutations.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Renders a connect button or connected dropdown for Plug Wallet with copy and disconnect actions.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Displays a profile creation form that saves the user’s name via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Shows a fullscreen reconnecting status overlay with attempt and gateway details.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors and displays a resettable fallback UI.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Defines mainnet config, canister IDs, model URLs, validation, and initialization helpers.
Provides context for Plug Wallet connection, principal management, and actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Defines a static list of placeholder modifier items with IDs, names, rarity tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: TypeScript types for governance backend data structures and API methods including proposals, voting, and staking.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL definitions for governance backend types and service methods matching the TypeScript interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity and refreshes queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Provides automatic multi-gateway actor reinitialization with retries, delay handling, and success/error callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Extends useActor with backend initialization polling, timeouts, identity tracking, and connectivity validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Creates an asset canister actor with environment validation, gateway health checks, retries, and failover logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Simple hook that checks the asset canister's /health endpoint with timeout and reports healthy or error status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Provides a React hook to upload GLB files to an asset canister using Plug Wallet, tracking progress and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes and retries creation of a governance canister actor with Internet Identity, using gateway failover and timeout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, login state, and persisted identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Creates and retries initialization of a marketplace canister actor with Internet Identity, including gateway failover and timeouts.
Defines generic and specific Plug Wallet transaction hooks for token, marketplace, and governance canisters with React Query integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching land data, profiles, balances, and performing mutations via various backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: React hook that initializes and retries creation of a token canister actor with gateway failover, timeout handling, and Internet Identity support.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining dark theme colors, fonts, and neon/glassmorphism visual effects.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Provides build timestamp/version metadata and utilities for cache-busting URLs, plus build info logging.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Debug utilities for 3D scene diagnostics, including logging, performance checks, GPU context info, and renderer detection.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty placeholder module for model-loading utilities.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Utility functions for formatting, parsing, and validating ICRC-1 token amounts using CBR’s 8‑decimal format.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React rendering with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the marketplace canister interface, including listings, item types, and buy result variants.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the marketplace canister service, item types, listing records, and buy result variants.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Displays a modifier collection with rarity counts and styled tier indicators using data from PLANNED_MODIFIER_CATALOG.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard managing land data, tabs for different views, and rendering components like LandDashboard, Discovery, and MapView.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page handling Internet Identity login with animated UI elements and background effects.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Initializes land data and shows loading or success messages before redirecting to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Renders a canister ID verification interface with a styled layout and link back to the homepage.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the token backend, including account, transfer types, errors, and token-related methods.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: IDL factory defining the token backend canister interface, including transfer, metadata, and mint operations.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Type declarations enabling WebGPU API support and preventing TypeScript errors during feature detection.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params (including hash), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend UI.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Defines Vite build settings, plugins, env handling, proxy rules, asset naming, and WASM inclusion.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, PBR rendering requirements, architectural rules, issues, and tracked feature specs.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment overview and quick start instructions for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Uploads .glb assets to the ICP mainnet AssetCanister with validation, rate limiting, and status reporting.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Uploads tiered .glb model files to the local AssetCanister using dfx and prints results and sample URLs.
unknown.txt: Contains a brief note referencing a test health endpoint.
